pages.text: the brazier is an essential tool for curses. other than that, it can be used for incense.$(br2)a brazier can take up to four items. to start using it, you need to light it using a flint and steel.
for convenience, braziers can also be attached to ceilings.

pages.title: incenses
pages.text: incenses are a simple usage method of the brazier. incense can apply extended potion effects after waking up.$(br2)simply light a nearby brazier with the needed ingredients and go to sleep.
the mortal coil incense is used for rather profane rites.$(br2)you may not want to prepare this before going to bed.
